examples.title: Success-Response:

Parameter.description: Optional url address to send information about export status

title: /file/upload
description: Get unique upload file url. This url is active only for one upload operation. You should not append this url to api server url.
name: UploadFileGet

title: /file/upload
description: Upload file using upload unique url (fetched by get method on /api/v2/file/upload). You should send file as request payload, i.e. by submitting HTML form with file input element and action parameter set to unique upload url. Path to uploaded file: /file/serve/<uploaded_file_id>.
name: UploadFilePost

examples.title: Error-Response:
examples.content:
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found (unique upload url is expired)
    404 Not Found
    The resource could not be found.
    No such upload session: unique_key

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: /jwt/obtain-token/
name: Obtain_token
description: API View that receives a POST with a user's username and password. Returns a JSON Web Token that can be used for authenticated requests.

examples.title: Error-Response:

title: /jwt/refresh_jwt_token/
name: Refresh_token
description: API View that returns a refreshed token (with new expiration) based on existing token If 'orig_iat' field (original issued-at-time) is found, will first check if it's within expiration window, then copy it to the new token

title: /translations/
description: Returns translations dictionary for specified language. If lang_id isn't specified, the dictionary is returned for default instance language
name: Translations
